entry.title: Eggplant & Garbanzo bean Salad
entry.content:
• Chinese egg plant (1)
  • Spinach (1/2 bag)
  • Bell pepper (1)
  • Garbanzo beans (1 can)
  • Spices (pinch)
    • Cumin Powder
    • Garam Masala
    • Masala X
    • Basil
  • Salt
  • Oil (olive)
  • Lemon
  1. Chop the gg plant and bell peppers
  2. Heat oil in a large pan
  3. Add egg plant, cook for 2 minutes with lid closed
  4. Add bell pepper
  5. Add the spices and salt, cook for 5 minutes with lid closed
  6. Add garbanzo beans
  7. Add some water, cook for 3 minutes
  8. Add spinach and toss for 1 minutes (until the spinach wilts a bit)
entry.summary: Chinese egg plant (1) Spinach (1/2 bag) Bell pepper (1) Garbanzo beans (1 can) Spices (pinch) Cumin Powder Garam Masala Masala X Basil Salt Oil (olive) Lemon

entry.title: Vegetarian Chili
entry.content:
Ingredients

  • Garbanzo beans (1 can)
  • Red Beans (1 can)
  • Onion (1)
  • Tomato diced (1 can)
  • Tomato Purée (1 can)
  • Basil
  • Spicy chili mix (whole foods)
  • Salt
  • Oil (Olive oil)

Steps

  1. Heat oil in a large pan
  2. Add chopped onions and saute for 2 minutes
  3. Add the can of diced tomatoes and the can of tomatoe Purée.
  4. Mix / stir for 2 minutes
  5. Add the chili spice mix, salt and basil
  6. Mix / Stir for for 2 minutes
  7. Add the 2 cans of Red & Garbanzo beans
  8. Cover with lid and cook for 5 minutes with low heat
entry.summary: Ingredients Garbanzo beans (1 can) Red Beans (1 can) Onion (1) Tomato diced (1 can) Tomato Purée (1 can) Basil Spicy chili mix (whole foods) Salt Oil (Olive oil)

entry.title: Pear Salad

Steps

duh !
